net.sf.rcer.conn.connections

Classes in net.sf.rcer.conn.connections used by net.sf.rcer.conn.connections
ConnectionData
          This class encapsulates a set of connection data used to connect to a SAP R/3 system.
ConnectionException
          This exception is thrown by the ConnectionManager if anything goes wrong when trying to establish a connection.
ConnectionManager
          The central manager for all active connections to the SAP R/3 systems.
ConnectionNotFoundException
          This exception occurs if an undefined connection is requested from the ConnectionRegistry or a IConnectionProvider.
ConnectionRegistry
          The central registry for definitions of connections to the SAP R/3 systems.
ConnectionType
          The connection type (direct or load balanced).
IConnection
          The actual data of a connection at runtime.
IConnectionData
          A set of connection data used to connect to a SAP R/3 system.
IConnectionStateListener
          Interface for an Observer that wants to be notified when the state of a connection changes.
ICredentials
          The data required to log on to a SAP R/3 system.
ProviderNotFoundException
          This exception occurs if an undefined connection provider is requested from the ConnectionRegistry.

Classes in net.sf.rcer.conn.connections used by net.sf.rcer.conn.ui.login
IConnectionData
          A set of connection data used to connect to a SAP R/3 system.
ICredentials
          The data required to log on to a SAP R/3 system.
ICredentialsProviderWithoutSelection
          An interface for a class that is able to provide logon credentials for a connection.
ICredentialsProviderWithSelection
          An interface for a class that is able to select a connection and provide logon credentials.
